price: Raajiiwwan irraas waan mokkorriin ifa ta’e isa keessa jiru isaaniif kennine.
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhum mina al-āyāti mā fīhi balāon mubīnun
